overview: Rachel is a food writer at a New York magazine who meets Washington columnist Mark at a wedding and ends up falling in love with him despite her reservations about marriage. They buy a house, have a daughter, and Rachel thinks they are living happily ever after until she discovers that Mark is having an affair while she is waddling around with a second pregnancy.
tagline: Sex. Love. Marriage. Some people don't know when to quit.
cast: Meryl Streep|Jack Nicholson|Jeff Daniels|Maureen Stapleton|Stockard Channing
